Title: Sokosha
Writer: Sam Catlin (developed by), Seth Rogen (developed by), Evan Goldberg (developed by), Garth Ennis (based on the graphic novels by), Steve Dillon (based on the graphic novels by), Mary Laws, Mary Laws (executive story editor), Olivia Dufault (story editor)
Actors: Dominic Cooper, Joseph Gilgun, Ruth Negga, Graham McTavish
Plot: The Saint corners the trio. Jesse makes a risky deal with the killer Cowboy and he races against the clock.
